name: Namada
intro: Proof-of-Stake L1 for interchain asset-agnostic privacy
introduce: Namada is a proof-of-stake L1 for interchain asset-agnostic privacy. Namada natively interoperates with fast-finality chains via IBC and with Ethereum via a trustless two-way bridge. For privacy, Namada deploys an upgraded version of the multi-asset shielded pool (MASP) circuit that allows all assets to share a common shielded set. Namada is Anoma’s first fractal instance and it deploys v1 of the Anoma protocol.
